006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.IDataTypeAdapter;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathException;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.INodeItem;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.IConstraint.Level;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
015
016import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogBuilder;
017import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
018import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
019
020import java.util.Comparator;
021import java.util.List;
022import java.util.regex.Pattern;
023
024import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
025import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
026
027/**
028 * Supports logging constraint findings to the configured Log4J2 instance.
029 */
030public class LoggingConstraintValidationHandler
031    extends AbstractConstraintValidationHandler {
032  private static final Logger LOGGER = LogManager.getLogger(DefaultConstraintValidator.class);
033  private static final Throwable NO_EXCEPTION = null;
034
035  private static LogBuilder getLogBuilder(@NonNull Level level) {
036    LogBuilder retval;
037    switch (level) {
038    case CRITICAL:
039      retval = LOGGER.atFatal();
040      break;
041    case ERROR:
042      retval = LOGGER.atError();
043      break;
044    case WARNING:
045      retval = LOGGER.atWarn();
046      break;
047    case INFORMATIONAL:
048      retval = LOGGER.atInfo();
049      break;
050    default:
051      throw new UnsupportedOperationException(String.format("unsupported level '%s'", level));
052    }
053    return retval;
054  }
055
056  @Override
057  protected String toPath(@NonNull INodeItem nodeItem) {
058    return nodeItem.toPath(getPathFormatter());
059  }
060
061  /**
062   * Determine if a failure to validate a constraint at the given severity level
063   * should be logged.
064   *
065   * @param level
066   *          the severity level to check
067   * @return {@code true} if the severity level should be logged, or {@code false}
068   *         otherwise
069   */
070  private static boolean isLogged(@NonNull Level level) {
071    boolean retval;
072    switch (level) {
073    case CRITICAL:
074      retval = LOGGER.isFatalEnabled();
075      break;
076    case ERROR:
077      retval = LOGGER.isErrorEnabled();
078      break;
079    case WARNING:
080      retval = LOGGER.isWarnEnabled();
081      break;
082    case INFORMATIONAL:
083      retval = LOGGER.isInfoEnabled();
084      break;
085    default:
086      throw new UnsupportedOperationException(String.format("unsupported level '%s'", level));
087    }
088    return retval;
089  }
090
091  private void logMessage(
092      @NonNull Level level,
093      @Nullable String identifier,
094      @NonNull INodeItem node,
095      @NonNull CharSequence message,
096      @Nullable Throwable cause) {
097    LogBuilder builder = getLogBuilder(level);
098    if (cause != null) {
099      builder.withThrowable(cause);
100    }
101    builder.log("{}{}: ({}) {}",
102        identifier == null ? "" : "[" + identifier + "] ",
103        level.name(),
104        toPath(node),
105        message);
106  }
107
108  @Override
109  public void handleCardinalityMinimumViolation(
110      @NonNull ICardinalityConstraint constraint,
111      @NonNull INodeItem node,
112      @NonNull ISequence<? extends INodeItem> targets,
113      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
114    Level level = constraint.getLevel();
115    if (isLogged(level)) {
116      logMessage(
117          level,
118          constraint.getId(),
119          node,
120          newCardinalityMinimumViolationMessage(
121              constraint,
122              node,
123              targets,
124              dynamicContext),
125          NO_EXCEPTION); // Null because there is no exeception, a Throwable cause.
126    }
127  }
128
129  @Override
130  public void handleCardinalityMaximumViolation(
131      @NonNull ICardinalityConstraint constraint,
132      @NonNull INodeItem node,
133      @NonNull ISequence<? extends INodeItem> targets,
134      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
135    Level level = constraint.getLevel();
136    if (isLogged(level)) {
137      logMessage(
138          level,
139          constraint.getId(),
140          node,
141          newCardinalityMaximumViolationMessage(
142              constraint,
143              node,
144              targets,
145              dynamicContext),
146          null);
147    }
148  }
149
150  @Override
151  public void handleIndexDuplicateKeyViolation(
152      @NonNull IIndexConstraint constraint,
153      @NonNull INodeItem node,
154      @NonNull INodeItem oldItem,
155      @NonNull INodeItem target,
156      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
157    Level level = constraint.getLevel();
158    if (isLogged(level)) {
159      logMessage(
160          level,
161          constraint.getId(),
162          target,
163          newIndexDuplicateKeyViolationMessage(
164              constraint,
165              node,
166              oldItem,
167              target,
168              dynamicContext),
169          NO_EXCEPTION);
170    }
171  }
172
173  @Override
174  public void handleUniqueKeyViolation(
175      @NonNull IUniqueConstraint constraint,
176      @NonNull INodeItem node,
177      @NonNull INodeItem oldItem,
178      @NonNull INodeItem target,
179      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
180    Level level = constraint.getLevel();
181    if (isLogged(level)) {
182      logMessage(
183          level,
184          constraint.getId(),
185          target,
186          newUniqueKeyViolationMessage(
187              constraint,
188              node,
189              oldItem,
190              target,
191              dynamicContext),
192          NO_EXCEPTION);
193    }
194  }
195
196  @SuppressWarnings("null")
197  @Override
198  public void handleKeyMatchError(
199      @NonNull IKeyConstraint constraint,
200      @NonNull INodeItem node,
201      @NonNull INodeItem target,
202      @NonNull MetapathException cause,
203      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
204    Level level = constraint.getLevel();
205    if (isLogged(level)) {
206      logMessage(
207          level,
208          constraint.getId(),
209          target,
210          cause.getLocalizedMessage(),
211          cause);
212    }
213  }
214
215  @Override
216  public void handleMatchPatternViolation(
217      @NonNull IMatchesConstraint constraint,
218      @NonNull INodeItem node,
219      @NonNull INodeItem target,
220      @NonNull String value,
221      @NonNull Pattern pattern,
222      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
223    Level level = constraint.getLevel();
224    if (isLogged(level)) {
225      logMessage(
226          level,
227          constraint.getId(),
228          target,
229          newMatchPatternViolationMessage(
230              constraint,
231              node,
232              target,
233              value,
234              pattern,
235              dynamicContext),
236          NO_EXCEPTION);
237    }
238  }
239
240  @Override
241  public void handleMatchDatatypeViolation(
242      @NonNull IMatchesConstraint constraint,
243      @NonNull INodeItem node,
244      @NonNull INodeItem target,
245      @NonNull String value,
246      @NonNull IDataTypeAdapter<?> adapter,
247      @NonNull IllegalArgumentException cause,
248      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
249    Level level = constraint.getLevel();
250    if (isLogged(level)) {
251      logMessage(
252          level,
253          constraint.getId(),
254          target,
255          newMatchDatatypeViolationMessage(
256              constraint,
257              node,
258              target,
259              value,
260              adapter,
261              dynamicContext),
262          cause);
263    }
264  }
265
266  @Override
267  public void handleExpectViolation(
268      @NonNull IExpectConstraint constraint,
269      @NonNull INodeItem node,
270      @NonNull INodeItem target,
271      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
272    Level level = constraint.getLevel();
273    if (isLogged(level)) {
274      logMessage(
275          level,
276          constraint.getId(),
277          target,
278          newExpectViolationMessage(
279              constraint,
280              node,
281              target,
282              dynamicContext),
283          NO_EXCEPTION);
284    }
285  }
286
287  @Override
288  public void handleAllowedValuesViolation(
289      List<IAllowedValuesConstraint> failedConstraints,
290      INodeItem target,
291      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
292
293    Level level = ObjectUtils.notNull(failedConstraints.stream()
294        .map(IConstraint::getLevel)
295        .max(Comparator.comparing(Level::ordinal))
296        .get());
297    if (isLogged(level)) {
298      logMessage(
299          level,
300          null,
301          target,
302          newAllowedValuesViolationMessage(
303              failedConstraints,
304              target),
305          null);
306    }
307  }
308
309  @Override
310  public void handleIndexDuplicateViolation(
311      @NonNull IIndexConstraint constraint,
312      @NonNull INodeItem node,
313      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
314    // always log at level critical
315    Level level = Level.CRITICAL;
316    if (isLogged(level)) {
317      logMessage(
318          level,
319          constraint.getId(),
320          node,
321          newIndexDuplicateViolationMessage(
322              constraint,
323              node),
324          NO_EXCEPTION);
325    }
326  }
327
328  @Override
329  public void handleIndexMiss(
330      @NonNull IIndexHasKeyConstraint constraint,
331      @NonNull INodeItem node,
332      @NonNull INodeItem target,
333      @NonNull List<String> key,
334      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
335    Level level = constraint.getLevel();
336    if (isLogged(level)) {
337      logMessage(
338          level,
339          constraint.getId(),
340          node,
341          newIndexMissMessage(
342              constraint,
343              node,
344              target,
345              key,
346              dynamicContext),
347          NO_EXCEPTION);
348    }
349  }
350
351  @Override
352  public void handleMissingIndexViolation(
353      @NonNull IIndexHasKeyConstraint constraint,
354      @NonNull INodeItem node,
355      @NonNull INodeItem target,
356      @NonNull String message,
357      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
358    Level level = constraint.getLevel();
359    if (isLogged(level)) {
360      logMessage(
361          level,
362          constraint.getId(),
363          node,
364          newMissingIndexViolationMessage(
365              constraint,
366              node,
367              target,
368              message,
369              dynamicContext),
370          NO_EXCEPTION);
371    }
372  }
373
374  @Override
375  public void handlePass(
376      @NonNull IConstraint constraint,
377      @NonNull INodeItem node,
378      @NonNull INodeItem target,
379      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
380    if (LOGGER.isDebugEnabled()) {
381      String identifier = constraint.getId();
382      LOGGER.atDebug().log("{}{}: ({}) {}",
383          identifier == null ? "" : "[" + identifier + "] ",
384          Level.INFORMATIONAL.name(),
385          toPath(node),
386          "Passed");
387    }
388  }
389
390  @Override
391  public void handleError(
392      @NonNull IConstraint constraint,
393      @NonNull INodeItem node,
394      @NonNull String message,
395      @NonNull Throwable exception,
396      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
397    Level level = Level.CRITICAL;
398    if (isLogged(level)) {
399      logMessage(
400          level,
401          constraint.getId(),
402          node,
403          message,
404          exception);
405    }
406  }
407}
